RADIO COMMUNICATIONS SYSTEMS:
Another item of considerable interest at the NARTB convention was the
radio-communication systems on display. With the situation so many stations
are experiencing with lack of communication facilities from remote to studio,
radio communication equipment becomes a necessity for coordinating program
services and equipment line-ups. Several systems are available on the market,
working in the 25 to 26 megacycle range. The transmitters operate with a low
power, of approximately 2 watts, and high gain reflectors are used to obtain
maximum service range. Rayetheon is marketing a highly portable combination
